summary: COMPLETE SUCCESS: Pro Upgrade functionality thoroughly tested and working perfectly. All features tested from free user registration through successful upgrade to Pro with backtest access.
passed_tests: User registration with unique test accounts
Free users see Pro Upgrade screen when clicking Backtest tab
Pro Upgrade screen shows correct layout: header, locked preview, features grid, pricing
All 8/8 upgrade screen UI components present and functional
Upgrade to Pro button successfully calls /api/subscription/upgrade endpoint
User subscription successfully upgraded from 'free' to 'pro'
Success message 'Upgraded to Pro! Welcome to the elite.' displays correctly
After upgrade, users can access Real Market Zone (ORB Execution Training)
Backtest features fully accessible post-upgrade with asset selection and training modules
Invalid subscription plan rejection (400 error handling)
Complete end-to-end upgrade flow tested with multiple users
